main event: An observer in Klamath Falls, Oregon reported seeing a bright white object that appeared to be falling rapidly before disappearing behind a mountain.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes., The object was identified as a round ball shape and was brighter than a typical meteor., The observer reported the object traveling at a very fast speed and descending., There was no sound associated with the object during the sighting., The object was estimated to be about 5000 feet in altitude and was observed at a distance of about 30 miles.
